item.title: HackTheBox Traceback Write Up w/o Metasploit
item.description: Traceback is an easy Linux box created by Xh4H. You have to enter a shell planted on the server, enter as webadmin, escalate privileges with lua/luvit to sysadmin and echo a reverse shell in 00-header file to get root access. If you have any questions you can find me on twitter @ajdintrejic. Reconnaissance Let’s run a quick nmap and full nmap scan in background: #top 1000 ports sudo nmap -sV -sC -O -oA nmap/initial 10.
